name: Destroying. All. Bots.
description:
Working as a Robot lost in the “Banana Bread” Galaxy,

you control a robot infected with malware.  

Your Goal is to execute operation “assisted destruction” 

where your goal is to locate the big shiny red self-destruct button,

located near the front of the space craft.

 

After locating this incredibly convenient boom button,

find yourself to the escape pods somewhere in the engine bay

within the two minutes allotted or face an explosive end!

 

One thing to note is that all the other shipmates are equipped

with an advanced malware tracker and if you get close enough will be detected!

Made by WITCCVGD students 12-(16-20)-19

Control Scheme -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

W-A-S-D (up-down-left-right)                                    [Space bar] = Jump
